amendment.description: An amendment numbered 107 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to prohibit funds made available by this Act from being used to implement or carry out the strategies provided by the Department of Education's September 2023 report titled "Strategies for Increasing Diversity and Opportunity in Higher Education.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A050) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A050) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A050) Agreed to by voice vote.
